code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import{darkColors,lightColors}from"../../assets/colors/colors";var initialState={colorIndex:0,discoveryMode:false,comingFromHome:true,allColors:lightColors,allColorsHelper:1};var reducers={SetColorIndex:function SetColorIndex(state,action){state.colorIndex=action.payload;},SetDiscoveryMode:function SetDiscoveryMode(state,action){state.discoveryMode=action.payload;},SetComingFromHome:function SetComingFromHome(state,action){state.comingFromHome=action.payload;},SetAllColors:function SetAllColors(state,action){state.allColors=action.payload;},SetAllColorsHelper:function SetAllColorsHelper(state,action){state.allColorsHelper=action.payload;},RotateColor:function RotateColor(state){if(state.discoveryMode){state.colorIndex=(state.colorIndex+1)%state.allColors.length;}}};var settingsSlice=createSlice({name:"settings",initialState:initialState,reducers:reducers});var SetColorIndex=settingsSlice.actions.SetColorIndex;export{SetColorIndex};var SetDiscoveryMode=settingsSlice.actions.SetDiscoveryMode;export{SetDiscoveryMode};var SetComingFromHome=settingsSlice.actions.SetComingFromHome;export{SetComingFromHome};var SetAllColors=settingsSlice.actions.SetAllColors;export{SetAllColors};var RotateColor=settingsSlice.actions.RotateColor;export{RotateColor};var SetAllColorsHelper=settingsSlice.actions.SetAllColorsHelper;export{SetAllColorsHelper};export var Colors=function Colors(state){return state.settings.allColors[state.settings.colorIndex];};export default settingsSlice.reducer;
